overview:
Eric co-founded IndieGoGo to bring advances in Internet technology to the creative community. He offers expertise in software development, technology architecture, and IT analytics and governance.

Prior to IndieGoGo, Eric was an IT Strategy Consultant at Diamond Management & Technology Consultants, working for Fortune 500 Companies across Financial Services, Insurance and Telecom industries. Eric was a founder of the Vanguard, the grassroots marketing team of The House Theater of Chicago. He graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Colorado at Boulder. Eric also holds an MBA from the Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley.
